title: BIG FACTS feat. FATHEAD (The ATL OG)
description:
In this can't-miss interview, Atlanta legend Fathead sits down with the Big Facts crew for a raw, unfiltered conversation. He opens up about his harrowing near-death experience of getting shot and how that trauma shaped his outlook on life and pursuit of forgiveness. 


Fathead keeps it 100 on Atlanta's unique culture, and then the interview takes an unexpected turn with a debate on whether platonic male/female friendships actually exist. Fathead then teases details about his upcoming movie "Common Sense," a gritty urban drama drawing inspiration from his own life experiences. This is a brief glimpse into one of ATL's most authentic voices.

 

| Visit: www.bigfactspod.com

| Follow: @BigFactsPod
